tableDescription.description: Every adventurer has one slot available for potions ready to use. Rest will be in your backpack. Consult with your DM before using Spell Storing Potions. The value of a consumable item, such as a potion or scroll, is typically half the value of a permanent item of the same rarity.

tableData.description: Lasts for a minute. Can be used twice. Additional 1d6 damage on chosen element (excludes radiant, necrotic etc.).
tableData.name: Elemental Oil

tableData.description: When you drink this potion, you magically emit light 30ft around you.
tableData.name: Light Emitting Potion

tableData.description: DC 16 DEX, or makes everyone in radius fall prone. Lubricant.
tableData.name: Lubricating Oil

tableData.description: Can melt through solid stone. Deals 2d10 amounts of damage per every round start in combat.
tableData.name: Fast Acting Acid

tableData.description: Required for Waystones to operate. You can also make it with Powdered Silver, Powdered Diamond, Charcoal & Magic Infused Liquid

tableData.description: A creature that ingests this poison must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution save or is paralysed for 10 minutes.
